title: Lovelace Scholarship Application Process
subtitle: If you are a Thinkr, we want you!
para: We will open applications to find the first recipient of the Lovelace Scholarship. Thinkr wants to help change education as we know it. This starts by relieving the burden of tuition and living expenses of a scholar who we feel encapsulates our goals as a community.

title: The Selection Process
subtitle: Sifting through the applicants
para: With the help of the The Dreamr DAO members, we will begin the process of choosing finalists for the Lovelace Scholarship. We look forward to working with our community on what will be a life changing event for students.

title: DAO Decision
subtitle: Dreamr DAO members will help us finalize the recipient of the scholarship
para: The members of the Dreamr DAO will evaluate the final ten applicants for the Lovelace Scholarship. Community members who receive the highest rarity tier of our NFT series  will automatically be a part of the DAO.

title: Awarding the Lovelace Scholarship
subtitle: Rewarding the first Thinkr
para: After the Dreamr DAO has made their decision,the first recipient of the Lovelace Scholarship will be announced. Together with the Thinkr community, the first step to changing higher education will begin.
